page.title: 18BONAR BRIDGE ENTERTAINMENTS
page.content: At Christmas the old people all meet at the church hall for their annual {Christmas party.}People from the village who sing or play an instument go along to entertain them. My name is Steven and I go to sing songs to them if I am asked. There are tea and cakes at half time and then more singing until it is time to go home. Later on in the year the local{MOD is held.I was competing in the boys over 10 and under 13. I sang a Gaelic song called{TOIRT MAGHAIH RI DIURA. Our competition was on at 12 00 hrs. There was only one other boy in the competition. My marks came to 169 but the other boy got 172. The competitions included singing, recorder playing and piping.
